ygData.subject: Lag at the Bazaar
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi everyone, Well I m probably going to get flamed for this but you all do realize that the bazaar is a new feature and it s going to get hammered by
ygData.messageBody:
Hi everyone,
Well I'm probably going to get flamed for this but you all do
realize that the bazaar is a new feature and it's going to get hammered
by practically all the players in the first couple of weeks? If any
Verant admins monitor this list maybe they could post the stats on how
many hits the servers for the bazaar are getting and their processing
percentage plus the net traffic stats. I bet that they will all
practically be maxed out. Basically what I'm saying is, yes the lag is
annoying but be patient and give it time and it will quickly even itself
out. The problem is not your computer, it's a combination of your
connection to the net and how many are also on at your local hub at the
same time you are, (if you have a broadband connection), and that the
servers are taking a hellacious beating right now. The bank in Kelethin
is this way, it lags when everyone is meeting there but when everyone is
out hackin and slashin it's really smooth.

Happy Hunting!
Steve
